title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Friday 17 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: man charged with albion street murder .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: thanks for reading leicestershire local live .
updates have now finished for the week - they will start again at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: weather : some rain overnight
text: it 'll be cloudy overnight with some scattered showery rain in the early hours .
lows of 6c ( 43f ) .
saturday will be cloudy with a few brighter spells .
a band of light , patchy rain is expected to move eastwards over the course of the day - highs of 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: a6 closure to be extended
text: an extra mile of the a6 near desborough and rothwell is to be closed this weekend as repairs to a damaged road bridge continue .
gaps were found under the road surface on both sides of the carriageway during a routine inspection on 18 january .
engineers decided to dig under the bridge , which crosses the river ise , and shore up its foundations .
from 08:00 on saturday the closure will be extended to cover the mile north of the desborough/braybrooke roundabout , to the b576 junction .
it 's hoped this section will reopen by monday 's evening rush-hour , with the entire a6 closure lifted by the end of the month .
author: Stuart Bailey
BBC News

documents.title: new video evidence forces murder admission
text: new video evidence forces murder admission

documents.title: anger over redundant electric car charger which has never worked
text: a motorist who tried in vain to power his electric car at a melton charging point installed by the council three years ago was angry to be told it was not yet operational .
author: Melton Times

documents.title: police cordon still in place
text: these roads in aylestone are still closed after a man was found with `` critical '' injuries
traffic update | braunstone lane east & middleton street remain closed due to an incident between narborough road & aylestone road .
traffic update @ 1820 .
braunstone lane east and middleton st now open again following earlier incident
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a 'blatant and stupid ' action
text: what davis did was fit a kitchen for a customer in shepshed and then he dumped the old kitchen and packaging in a private field on benscliffe road .
magistrates said the fly-tip was a blatant '' action and `` a stupid thing to do '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man sentenced for fly-tipping
text: look at this mess
it was found dumped in newtown linford in february last year .
earlier this week 37-year-old gavin davis from saunderson road in leicester admitted to fly-tipping and was sentenced to a 12-month community order and given a bill for £ 160 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: date for repair work to complete
text: remember back in august when this happened ?
the bridge on grove lane in barrow upon soar collapsed onto the tracks .
network rail has been there ever since doing repair work but now they 've announce they expect that to be complete by 27 march .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : delays in coalville
text: # coalville a511 bardon rd & beveridge lane struggling due to temporary lights & accident recovery work .
avoid long queues
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : dog walking in rutland
text: thanks to pete for sending this in on his way to sewstern - i hope you took your brolly
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: female referee 'no different ' to male counterparts
text: referee sara cox ( see 12:45 ) has been speaking about her historic appointment for loughborough students match vs. plymouth albion .
`` i 'm very excited actually , '' ms cox told bbc radio 1 's newsbeat .
`` i just like the game of rugby to be honest , whether it be female or males that are playing i just enjoy being out there officiating .
`` i do n't see myself as any different to my male counterparts who are refereeing at this level . ''
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: attack on brendan mason
text: let me remind you of the background to the case of brendan mason 's murder
in july last year the 23-year-old from glenfield was discovered near the lake in abbey park in leicester - police have said he 'd been attacked , stripped and washed in the lake .
he was taken to hospital but died from a head injury .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: men to be sentenced for murder
text: leicester crown court has confirmed lowe and hack will both be sentenced for murder on monday ( 20 february ) .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: plenty of cloud around throughout the afternoon though there may be a couple of brighter spells developing as the cloud thins for a time .
dry with highs of 11c ( 52f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: keith lowe admits killing brendan mason
text: a second man has pleaded guilty to murdering 23-year-old brendan mason , leicestershire police said .
keith lowe , 22 , admitted murder earlier today part way through his trial at leicester crown court .
joshua hack , 21 , pleaded guilty to the same charge at an earlier hearing .
brendan was found in abbey park , leicester , on the morning of 5 july , with serious injuries .
he died later that day in hospital as a result of severe head injuries .

documents.title: time is running out on lottery ticket
text: the people that run the national lottery have been over to melton to appeal to find the winner with help from the indoor bowling club who received lottery funding in 1996
the owner of the winning lottery ticket has just a few more days to collect their winnings - it will expire on 23 february .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: did you win the lottery ?
text: could you be the winner of this £ 100,000 cheque ?
the national lottery is still hunting for the person who bought a winning lottery ticket in melton and has n't claimed their winnings .
the draw was on 27 august 2016 and it was n't the number that won - is was the raffle code : plum 4305 4613 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: top curry restaurants named
text: there 's a bit of a party going on a bbc leicester hq for the announcement of the leicester curry awards nominees
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : tigers team news
text: maxime mermoz , telusa veainu and jp pietersen start for leicester tigers against bristol in the premiership tomorrow .
here 's the full starting 15
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: female official breaks new ground in rugby
text: the rugby football union is excited to have a female referee taking charge of a national league one match for the first time this weekend .
sara cox will ref the game between loughborough students and plymouth albion .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: murder suspect in court
text: suleiman sillah has appeared at leicester magistrates ' court this morning charged with the murder of lauric lebato .
he has been remanded into custody to appear at the city 's crown court on 17 march .
author: Giles Taylor
BBC East Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: police cordon in aylestone
text: scene near middleton street in leicester
a man aged 27 is in a critical condition .
six teenagers have been arrested after what police are calling an `` assault '' .
author: Amy Harris
Reporter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: wanted : former shoe factory workers
text: did you ever work at the british shoe corporation in leicester ?
if so , you 're invited to a reunion next month .
the firm employed people from across the region .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: young teenagers arrested following assault
text: six teenagers , including two 13-year-olds , have been arrested after a man was assaulted on middleton street in aylestone .
it happened early this morning - a 27-year-old man remains in a critical condition in hospital in nottingham .
three boys , aged 15 , 14 and 13 and three girls , two aged 14 and one aged 13 , are currently in police custody .
this is the reason braunstone lane east is closed .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: schmeichel and zieler 's 'positive competition '
text: leicester city 's ron-robert zieler speaks about his relationship with fellow goalkeeper kasper schmeichel
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: a need for reptile rescue shelter
text: dean has lots of snakes and a bearded dragon inside his home at the moment but he will eventually have a purpose built `` rescue shelter '' in the garden .
he said a lot of people get animals like this for a `` novelty '' but they do n't realise how big they grow .
for example the snake in the photo is a baby boa constrictor .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man turns home into snake sanctuary
text: how do you feel when you see this - scared ?
well it 's not exactly your ty `` cute and fluffy '' pet .
dean liddle likes snakes so much he 's turned his home in earl shilton into a reptile rescue centre .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: marines pushing their bodies 'to the limit '
text: it all sounds a bit crazy , so why are the two former marines putting themselves through all of this ?
well anthony spoke to bbc radio leicester this morning and they asked him .
he said : `` the experience , the adventure , pushing our bodies to the limit of human endurance has always been something that 's interested myself and louis .
`` most importantly , we 're doing this to raise funds and awareness for mental health within the forces community on behalf of the royal marines charity and help for heroes . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: the island challenge continues
text: this is what meal time in borneo looks like
after papua new guinea the pair will aim to travel across madagascar , greenland and baffin island .
no i 've never heard of baffin island either but it looks cold !
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : island challenge
text: a man from rutland is attempting to cross the five biggest islands on the planet using only human power .
anthony lambert is a former royal marine commando - as is his teammate louis nethercott .
this was the pair crossing the first of the five islands , borneo .
they 're now heading off to papua new guinea .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

text: weather for the east midlands

BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: jet2 to employ 100 more people at east midlands airport
text: new jobs are being created at east midlands airport after the budget airline jet2 decided to bring it 's ground handling operations in-house .
the company 's taking on ramp handling services that were previously operated by another firm .
about 100 fixed-term and permanent jobs will need filling by the busy summer season .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: travel : roads closed in braunstone
text: in # leicester braunstone lane east and middleton st are being closed between aylestone road and narbrough road due to an # incident .
do you know if residents will be able to access middleton st via braunstone lane east after 5pm today ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: men bailed for 'possession of an offensive weapon '
text: the two men arrested alongside sulaiman sillah on tuesday have been released on police bail .
they were being held on sus of possession of an offensive weapon .
the men , aged 19 and 20 , were also arrested on sus of violent disorder but no further action will be taken , police said .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: murder charge after street attack death
text: a man has been charged with murder following the death of lauric lebato in leicester .
the 22 year old , from finsbury park , north london , died in hospital after being found with a stab wound in albion street on saturday morning .
mr lebato , was said to have been at a party at a flat nearby before the attack .
sulaiman sillah , 20 , of bateman road , leicester , who was also charged with violent disorder , is due at leicester magistrates ' court later .
he was also charged with possession of an offensive weapon .
author: Neil Heath
BBC News Online

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning - hurrah it 's friday !
i 'll be writing the updates on leicestershire local live today with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
it would be great to hear from you so please share any comments or photos by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
